name: Four in a row ∙
description:
The aim of the game is simple: connect 4 pieces in a line vertically, horizontally or diagonally. It's a fun game that you can play alone or with your friends, for FREE!

DIFFERENT GAME MODES

- 1 player: Easy, Normal, Expert
- 2 players: Play with your friends on one screen for free

COMPLETE FONCTIONALITIES

- Leaderboard: every time you win, you get points
- Listen to your music while playing
- Different beautiful game designs
- Games are automatically saved

OPTIONS

- Aim helps
- Deactivate the sounds
- Swap colors
This connect 4 game is free and ad-supported.
